packagegui.name: localrepo
packagegui.title: LocalRepo Configuration Settings

field.description:
LocalRepo allows for an offline build of pfSense while still maintaining normal package installation functions and removel.

Seleceting "None" will result in not having package installs available, stops pfSense from calling out to update the installed
packages, and eliminates the homepage webinterface error that runs until timeout without internet connection.

Selecting "Local" allows for package installs from an onboard repository, stops pfSense from calling out to update the installed
packages, and eliminates the homepage webinterface error that runs until timeout without internet connection.
Select the desired repository for pfSense to use. 12 (optional)
Packages to include in the local repository.
Re/Build local repository with packages selected above. This could take an extended amount of time. [Please wait]
Update local repository with packages selected above. (pfSense must be online)
